text:
MTS. NOVIK, Director
F. H. LaGUARDIA, Mayor
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
WORTH 2*5600
WNYC
August 12, 1940
And
Stations
WASJ
WKDX
W2XRG
W2XVP
WNYK
WNYL
WNYN
WNYO
Mr. Frank E. Sohooley
Executive Secretary
The National Association of
Educational. Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
My dear Frank:
In reference to your letter
of August 6th, vVNYC has not been particularly
disturbed about hours of operation because, as you
know, we are constantly fighting for more and more
time on the air.
I do vote, however, for giving
the Secretary the authority to negotiate for the
N.A.E.B. with the Federal Communications Commission.
I haven’t any doubt that the Commission would be
sympathetic.
If you feel it would be of any
help to the Association, I*d be glad to discuss it
in person with the Secretary or the Chairman.
Sincerely yours,
Director
MSN:sd
‘New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
